info.description: Total population as estimated by the U.S. Census Bureau.

info.description: Number of doctors available per 1,000 people, as calculated within floating catchment areas with normalized Gaussian weights based on Euclidean distance.

info.description: Number of doctors available per 1,000 people, as calculated within floating catchment areas with Gaussian weights based on Euclidean distance.
info.statement: There are {value} doctors available per 1,000 people in {features.name}.

info.long_name: Doctors (3-Step Floating Catchment Area Ratio, 30 minutes)
info.description: Number of doctors available per 1,000 people, as calculated within smaller floating catchment areas with normalized Gaussian weights within 30 minute buffers.
info.statement: There are {value} doctors available per 1,000 people in {features.name}.

info.description: Number of doctors available per 1,000 people, as calculated within floating catchment areas (60-minute radius) with normalized step weights.
info.statement: There are {value} doctors available per 1,000 people in {features.name}.

info.description: Number of doctors available per 1,000 people, as calculated within floating catchment areas (60-minute radius) with step weights.
info.statement: There are {value} doctors available per 1,000 people in {features.name}.

info.long_name: Doctors (3-Step Floating Catchment Area Ratio, commuter-based)
info.description: Number of doctors available per 1,000 people, as calculated within floating catchment areas (60-minute radius) with normalized weights adjusted for multiple origins (home and work).
info.statement: There are {value} doctors available per 1,000 people in {features.name}.
